const response = await client.search({
  index: "my_locations",
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: {
        match_all: {},
      },
      filter: {
        geo_bounding_box: {
          "pin.location": {
            wkt: "BBOX (-74.1, -71.12, 40.73, 40.01)",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
